prompt: A deep house groove driven by a four-on-the-floor kick from a live drum kit with brushy hi-hats. An acoustic double bass provides the low end with a woody, resonant tone, while a Rhodes electric piano plays jazzy chords. Warm room ambience, intimate and organic feel. Instrumental, no vocals.

prompt_fields.control_delta: Timbre swap: replace synth bass/drum machine with acoustic double bass + live kit + electric piano
